sections.title: Annual Fee
rules: Fee is waived if yearly spends exceed ₹1,00,000.
examples: If you spend ₹1.2L in a card anniversary year, you pay zero annual fee.
If you spend ₹80,000, the annual fee will apply.
notes: Annual fee posts in the first statement after card activation.
Waiver is computed automatically at the end of the anniversary cycle.

sections.title: Late Payment Charges
rules: Late fee applies if minimum due is not paid by due date.
examples: If your total due is ₹7000 and you pay after due date, late fee = ₹750.
notes: Late payment also adds daily interest on outstanding amount.

sections.title: Finance Charges
rules: Interest applies if full amount is not paid.
examples: If you carry ₹10,000 balance, you incur ~₹300 interest for the next month.
notes: Interest applies on ALL transactions until full dues are cleared.

sections.title: Cash Advance Fees
notes: Avoid cash advances—they are the costliest form of credit.
